I tested positive for COVID-19, symptoms started over 2 weeks ago. I’m fine now. But my job is requiring 2 negative tests before return to work. However, hospitals are refusing to retest due to shortage of tests. So, I’m out on workers comp for the foreseeable future 🤷🏻‍♂️ #COVID19
